text: Mēlum, avarkaḷ etirpārkkāta vakaiyil avarkaḷukku vēṇṭiya vacatikaḷai aḷippāṉ. Evarkaḷ allāhvai muṟṟilum nampukiṟārkaḷō, avarkaḷukku avaṉē (muṟṟilum) pōtumāṉavaṉ. Niccayamāka allāh taṉ kāriyattaic ceytē muṭippāṉ. Āyiṉum, allāh ovvoṉṟiṟkum (oru kālattaiyum) aḷavaiyum ēṟpaṭuttiviṭṭāṉ. (Ataṉpaṭiyē naṭaipeṟum)
